General.Name: Lionmesh Prima Tbk
General.Description: PT Lionmesh Prima Tbk engages in the manufacture of various welded wire mesh products in Indonesia. It offers wire mesh fences, gabions, drawn wire, practice columns, and other related products. The company was formerly known as PT Lion Weldmesh Prima. PT Lionmesh Prima Tbk was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan Raya Bekasi Km. 24.5, Jakarta, Indonesia, 13910

4.Name: Ms. Tjhai Tjhin Kiat
4.Title: Director of Sidoarjo Branch & Independent Director
